product.name: Bioluz LED 4 Pack PAR30 LED Bulbs Flood Light Indoor/Outdoor High CRI 75W Equivalent Using 11W Dimmable 3000K Soft White 850 Lumen UL Listed FCC RoAS Compliant High Efficacy Lighting
product.description: Bioluz LED Light Bulbs: Bright, Efficient, Reliable - The ultimate in Quality, Efficiency and sustainability. Based in the USA Bioluz LED brings a new level of performance and style to your home, with light bulbs that blend brightness, energy efficiency, and a pleasing aesthetic Pick the product that best fits your needs: BR Series bulbs cast a wide light beam angle: 110 degrees PAR Series bulbs cast a narrower beam angle: 40 degrees BR20 & PAR20 flood light bulbs have a 2.5â€ diameter perfect for 4â€ recessed cans BR30 & PAR30 flood light bulbs have a 3.75â€ diameter and fit 5â€ & 6â€ recessed cans BR40 & PAR38 flood light bulbs have a 4.75â€ diameter and fit 6â€ recessed cans When choosing the color temperature of your LED bulbs, consider the following: 2700K Warm White are identical to incandescent bulbs 3000K Soft White replace halogen bulbs, slightly less yellow than 2700K 4000K Cool White has almost no yellow 5000K Daylight is designed to capture the bright sun on a summer day 2700K & 3000K bulbs are typically used in bedrooms and living rooms or anywhere you want a warm and inviting atmosphere 4000K & 5000K bulbs are often seen in kitchens and bathrooms, or anywhere you want a crisp, more modern feeling
